item.title: Venezuela live updates: Trump to give more details after US strike
item.description: Trump said more information about the U.S. operation would be provided at a news conference at 11 a.m. Saturday.

item.title: WATCH: Security concerns in the US after Venezuela strike
item.description: The extraordinary nighttime operation is raising security concerns here at home.

item.title: Why Venezuela? Trump's shifting explanations about military buildup
item.description: Trump and his aides have given shifting explanations about the military buildup.

item.title: Iran's leader says rioters 'must be put in their place'
item.description: Iran’s supreme leader has addressed the ongoing protests, insisting that “rioters must be put in their place.”

item.title: US captures Maduro, carries out 'large scale strike' in Venezuela
item.description: Nicolas Maduro and his wife were captured by the U.S. amid a "large scale strike" in Venezuela, President Donald Trump said.
